Developed actions for IPQPR's (In process quality problem reports), SQPR's (Supplier quality problem reports) to present to Japanese quality teams. Prepared product and process engineering change requests (ECR's) documentations, cost reduction proposals and presented to management. Developed manufacturing process layout, control plans, work instructions and PFMEA.
